'gata kapanna' yana wadana bihiwima gana ma thula awinishchitha adahasaki aththe.eya minisun lensuwe gata gasagena giya mudal sorakam kirima nisa upanneda nathnam antila hatte asse sangawagena giya mudal horakam kirima ha sambandhawa bihiwida yanna pahadili natha.kese wethath mudal pasumbi nathi wima dan etharam bahulawa sidu nowe.'mudal pasumbi' yana wadana da shabdha koshayen iwath kala yuthuyayi horun wisin langadima yojana karanu niyathaya.pasumbiye aththe sisan pathraya,dina darshana, bilpath, bas tikat, banku kad, handunum path, saha riyaduru balapathra aadiya ya.mudal kiya aththe dainika bas gasthuwa sandaha rupiyal dahayak ho wissak pamanakya.kalakata pera jangama durakathana sorakam kirima sighrawa ihala giyeya.namuth china durakathanawala aagamanayath samanga eewa sorakam kirimada padu labannata wu bawin eewa sorakam kirimada dan pahala gos atha.me dinawala dumriye yana ena magin wadiyen parissam karanne elawalu mallaya.
